text: arab ke dehaatee kahate hain ki ham eemaan lae (ai rasool) tum kah do ki tum eemaan nahin lae balki (yoon) kah do ki islaam lae haaloki eemaan ka abhee tak tumhaare dil mein guzar hua hee nahin aur agar tum khuda kee aur usake rasool kee pharamaabaradaaree karoge to khuda tumhaare aamaal mein se kuchh kam nahin karega - beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
